This is with WTP 1.0.2 200604200208. I will send Chuck the testcase.

I tried the export with the workspace you sent on the 1.5 code base; the first time it failed, and I'm not 100% sure why, but I think because the .component meta-data was messed up; one of the archives probably couldn't be loaded.  Then I tried again and it worked fine.
